name: Gabriele
text: Lovely hotel with friendly and professional staff. The decoration of the hotel is very nice . Room are big with king size bed .Pressure in the shower is perfect . Food in both restaurant is very nice . The Haman was superb with friendly a professional staff. We really enjoy our stay 100% recomended

name: Hanan
text: really nice breakfast, spacious room, good location, friendly staff ,very good seafood restaurant. lots of option for food nearby too

name: Margaret
text: Fantastic hotel , very friendly and helpful staff. Spa treatments brilliant , would return return.

name: Eliis
text: Everything was great. Beautiful and comfortable hotel with a great location. Rooms are spacious, breakfast lovely. Rooftop area has amazing views.

name: Julian
text: Lovely hotel, great design with a comfortable room, and the breakfast was fantastic. Very helpful front desk, quiet location (get rooms overlooking the rear).

name: Marilena
text: A little gem, very well located, within walking distance from the tourist attractions and a few good restaurants, although Patron de la Mer, the in-house restaurant is an excellent option. The rooms are tastefully decorated, spacious and comfortable. Breakfast is delicious, spa services are great too, but the greatest plus of this hotel are its employees, good natured, always with a smile and happy to help. We would definitely return.

name: Sarah
text: Very well organised, fabulous staff teams, effective management. Exceptional polite, professional and sensible staff. Fabulous hospitality
